name: Special characters passed to txId
description: Response message from API:{"success":{"txId":"@@@@@","statusCode":200,"body":"{\"type\": \"https://zalando.github.io/problem/constraint-violation\", \"title\": \"Constraint Violation\", \"status\": 400, \"path\": \"/notes\", \"violations\": [{\"field\": \"transactionId.equals\", \"message\": \"Failed to convert property value of type 'java.lang.String' to required type 'java.lang.Integer' for property 'transactionId.equals'; nested exception is java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: \\\"@@@@@\\\"\"}], \"message\": \"error.validation\"}"}}
